title: Kena Bridge of Spirits Reviews Are In! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.21.21
description:
Tim and Gary go over the Kena Bridge of Spirits reviews, the latest on Halo Infinite's test flights, Activisions legal situation, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:40 - Housekeeping
It's SUB-TEMBER On Twitch! Viewers across the platform throughout the month can take advantage of 20% off subscriptions for first-time subscribers and gifted subs. Your support means the world to us here at Kinda Funny and right now you can take advantage of this deal and receive benefits like ad-free viewing, sub emotes, and more.
[This needs to be in every day this week] Thursday, we’re playing World War Z: Aftermath for a sponsored stream. You can swing by at 11 am PT right after Kinda Funny Games Daily to see Greg, Mike, Andy, and Blessing blast some zombies. If you miss it live, it’ll be on our newest youtube channel youtube.com/kindafunnyplays after!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: The Kinda Funny Destiny 2 PC Clan & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:07:40 - Kena Bridge of Spirits Reviews Are In!
00:32:45 - Ad
00:36:13 - Invites and info for the next Halo Infinite Multiplayer Tech Preview are officially rolling out. (The official HaloWaypoint)
00:46:10 - Halo Infinite Dev Explains Multiplayer Challenges to Ease Worries About Progression (Matt Purslow at IGN)
00:53:40 - U.S. Government Now Investigating Activision Blizzard, Bobby Kotick Subpoenaed (Zack Zwizen at Kotaku)00:59:00 - Last of Us Costumes Coming To Sackboy a Big Adventure September 26th
01:00:20 - Out today
01:02:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and SBM
